sysevent_email_template.message_html:
NC DIT Network Services Provisioning System

Network Service Quotation

Number: ${number}, Site name: ${site_name}

Requested service codes: ${requested_service_codes}

Opened: ${opened_at}, by: ${opened_by}

 

Dear ${opened_by},

You request for service was received. Based on the information supplied in your request, the system has calculated an estimate for the monthly cost for the service. Please understand this represents only an estimate. Actual costs may change as more details about the requirements and implementation are discovered. Also, keep in mind that all new service requests will incur a $500.00 one-time installation charge in addition to the recurring monthly amount estimated here. 

Requested Service:  ${quoted_service_title}

Your monthly estimate is:  $ ${quoted_cost}

Bill code: ${bill_code}

You (and the person listed as the "requested for" if other than yourself) will receive a separate notice for Approval of your request. If you approve, the task will move on to a network analyst for provisioning. You may, instead, reject the request as submitted and the task will be canceled and no further activity will take place. Both the requester and the requested for persons must approve for the task to continue.

You may also Approve or Reject from the nspro client portal here:

https://ncgovappdev.servicenowservices.com/x/g/dit-nspro/landing 

Please refer to the nspro client portal for status and other information.

Thanks for letting us serve you.

Regards,

your friendly nspro automation system
sysevent_email_template.name: nspro quote template
sysevent_email_template.subject: nspro service quote for ${number}: ${site_name}
